mapper.select: select ca.user_id, ca.name, ca.profile_photo as small_head_photo, ca.video, ca.detail, ca.type as type, if(ca.type = 1, (select md.work_time from medical_doctor md where id = (select doctor_id from medical_doctor_account as mda where mda.account_id = #{userId}) ),null) as workTime from oe_user ou inner join course_anchor ca on ou.id = ca.user_id where ou.id = #{userId}

( select count(*) from (select count(*) from apply_r_grade_course where course_id in (select id from oe_course where user_lecturer_id =#{userId} ) group by user_id) as aaa) UNION ALL ( select count(*) as number from oe_course as oc where oc.user_lecturer_id =#{userId} and oc.status=1 and oc.is_delete=0 )

select * from ( ( select (select course.grade_name from oe_course course where course.id = ood.course_id) as gradeName, CONCAT('+',format(uci.value,2)) as value,uci.create_time as createTime,'课程' as label,"熊猫币" as unit from user_coin_increase uci inner join oe_order_detail ood on uci.correlation_id = ood.id where uci.change_type =7 and value > 0 and ood.course_id in (select id from oe_course as oc where oc.user_lecturer_id =#{userId} ) ) UNION ALL ( select (select course.grade_name from oe_course course where course.id = ogs.live_id) as gradeName, CONCAT('+',format(sum(uci.value),2)) as value,max(ogs.create_time) as createTime,'直播礼物' as label,"熊猫币" as unit from user_coin_increase uci inner join oe_gift_statement ogs on uci.correlation_id = ogs.id where uci.change_type = 3 and value > 0 and ogs.receiver = #{userId} group by ogs.live_id ) UNION ALL ( select '' as gradeName,format(ucc.value,2) as value,ucc.create_time as createTime,'结算' as label,"熊猫币" as unit from user_coin_consumption as ucc where ucc.change_type = 5 and ucc.user_id = #{userId} ) ) as jiesuan order by jiesuan.createTime desc limit #{pageNumber},#{pageSize}

select * from ( ( select '1' as type,'赠送礼物' as subject ,format(ucc.value,0) as totalAmount,ucc.create_time as gmtCreate,"熊猫币" as unit, ca.`name` as receiver,'' as courseName,format(ucc.value,0) as money,ucc.correlation_id as orderId, if(ogs.pay_type=0,'支付宝',if(ogs.pay_type=1,'微信',if(ogs.pay_type=2,'网银','熊猫币'))) as payType from user_coin_consumption as ucc,oe_gift_statement as ogs,course_anchor as ca where ucc.correlation_id=ogs.id AND ca.user_id=ogs.receiver AND ucc.change_type = 8 and ucc.user_id=#{userId} ) UNION ALL
( select '2' as type,'购买课程' as subject ,format(ucc.value,0) as totalAmount,ucc.create_time as gmtCreate,"熊猫币" as unit, '' as receiver,oc.grade_name as courseName,format(ucc.value,0) as money,ucc.correlation_id as orderId, if(oo.pay_type=0,'支付宝',if(oo.pay_type=1,'微信',if(oo.pay_type=2,'苹果内购',if(oo.pay_type=3,'熊猫币',if(oo.pay_type=4,'线下支付','其他支付'))))) as payType from user_coin_consumption as ucc, oe_order oo,oe_order_detail ood,oe_course oc where ucc.correlation_id=oo.order_no AND oo.id=ood.order_id AND ood.course_id=oc.id AND ucc.change_type = 10 and ucc.user_id=#{userId} )
UNION ALL
( select '3' as type,'充值' as subject ,CONCAT('+',format(uci.value,0)) as totalAmount,uci.create_time as gmtCreate,"熊猫币" as unit , '' as receiver,'' as courseName,format(uci.value,0) as money,uci.correlation_id as orderId, if(uci.pay_type=0,'支付宝',if(uci.pay_type=1,'微信','苹果内购')) as payType from user_coin_increase as uci where uci.change_type = 1 and uci.user_id=#{userId} )
UNION ALL
( select '4' as type,'购买课程' as subject,CONCAT('-',format(argc.cost,2)) as totalAmount,argc.create_time as gmtCreate,"人民币" as unit , '' as receiver,oc.grade_name as courseName,format(argc.cost,2) as money,oo.order_no as orderId, if(oo.pay_type=0,'支付宝',if(oo.pay_type=1,'微信',if(oo.pay_type=2,'苹果内购',if(oo.pay_type=3,'熊猫币',if(oo.pay_type=4,'线下支付','其他支付'))))) as payType from oe_order_detail ood INNER JOIN apply_r_grade_course as argc on ood.id =argc.order_no INNER JOIN oe_order as oo on ood.order_id =oo.id INNER JOIN oe_course as oc on oc.id =ood.course_id WHERE oo.pay_type in (0,1) and argc.user_id =#{userId} )
) as tixian order by tixian.gmtCreate desc

mapper.select: select ca.type from oe_user as ou INNER JOIN course_anchor as ca on ou.id = ca.user_id where ou.id =#{userId} and ca.status=1 and ca.deleted =0 and ou.status = 0 and ou.is_delete =0

select ca.profile_photo as headPortrait, ca.name, ca.user_id as userId from course_anchor ca join oe_user ou on ca.user_id = ou.id where ca.deleted = 0 AND ou.is_delete = 0 AND ca.is_recommend = 1 ORDER BY ca.recommend_sort DESC
